title: The Faerie Guardian, Part IV
description: [This novelette is Part IV of THE FAERIE GUARDIAN by Rachel Morgan]Betrayed by someone she never expected, Violet deals with her anger and hurt by teaming up with her archrival Ryn to help him find his missing sister. Hanging out with Ryn isn’t high on Vi’s list of things to do, but she kind of owes him after he inconveniently saved her life recently. As the two of them struggle to put their differences aside, they find themselves drawn into a plot much greater than a single missing child. A plot with Violet herself at the center.
author: Rachel  Morgan
